# GitHub Topics Guide for Nuotit

## How to Set Topics

1. Go to [github.com/petrikaj/nuotit](https://github.com/petrikaj/nuotit)
2. Click the ⚙️ gear icon next to "About" in the right sidebar
3. Add the topics listed below
4. Add a description and website URL

## Recommended Description

```
Nuotit — Podcast player for iOS with professional audio processing. 9-band EQ, dynamics engine, voice isolation, on-device transcripts, and clip export. Better Sound, Smarter Play.
```

## Recommended Website

```
https://nuotit.org
```

## Recommended Topics

Add these topics (GitHub allows up to 20):

### Primary (highest SEO value)
```
podcast
podcast-player
podcast-app
ios
ipad
ipados
```

### Feature-focused
```
audio
audio-processing
equalizer
voice-isolation
transcription
rss
```

### Technology & ecosystem
```
swift
apple
macos
visionos
```

### Community & discovery
```
indie-app
privacy
```

## Why These Topics Matter

Each topic makes the repo appear on the corresponding [GitHub Topics page](https://github.com/topics). These pages:
- **Rank highly in Google** for searches like "podcast player iOS github"
- Surface your repo to **developers and tech-savvy users** browsing topics
- Are indexed by **AI crawlers** and knowledge bases
- Create **permanent backlinks** to your repo

## Topic Pages You'll Appear On

After adding topics, Nuotit will be discoverable on:
- [github.com/topics/podcast](https://github.com/topics/podcast)
- [github.com/topics/podcast-player](https://github.com/topics/podcast-player)
- [github.com/topics/podcast-app](https://github.com/topics/podcast-app)
- [github.com/topics/ios](https://github.com/topics/ios)
- [github.com/topics/audio-processing](https://github.com/topics/audio-processing)
- [github.com/topics/equalizer](https://github.com/topics/equalizer)
- [github.com/topics/voice-isolation](https://github.com/topics/voice-isolation)
- [github.com/topics/transcription](https://github.com/topics/transcription)
- [github.com/topics/indie-app](https://github.com/topics/indie-app)
- [github.com/topics/privacy](https://github.com/topics/privacy)
- ...and more

## Social Preview Image

Upload `assets/app/4tile_fullhd.png` as the repository's social preview image:
1. Go to repo Settings → General
2. Scroll to "Social preview"
3. Upload `assets/app/4tile_fullhd.png`

This image will appear when the repo is shared on social media, Slack, Discord, etc.
